###########################################################
        nop        
start1: ldi r2, ff
start2: ldi r1, ff
start3: ldi r0, ff

delay1: cpi r0, 0
        jz delay2
        adi r0, ff  // add -1
        jmp delay1

delay2: cpi r1, 0
        jz delay3
        adi r1, ff  // add -1
        jmp start3

delay3: cpi r2, 0
        jz toggle
        adi r2, ff  // add -1
        jmp start2

toggle: in r0, 0
        xoi r0, 1
        ani r0, 1
        out r0, 0
        jmp start1
###########################################################
0000000000000000 nop
0010111111110001 ldi r2, ff
0001111111110001 ldi r1, ff
0000111111110001 ldi r0, ff

0000000000001101 cpi r0, 0
0110000010110000 jz
0000000000001010 delay2
0000111111111001 adi r0, ff
0000000010110000 jmp
0000000000000100 delay1

0001000000001101 cpi r1, 0
0110000010110000 jz
0000000000010000 delay3
0001111111111001 adi r1, ff
0000000010110000 jmp
0000000000000011 start3

0010000000001101 cpi r2, 0
0110000010110000 jz
0000000000010110 toggle
0010111111111001 adi r2, ff
0000000010110000 jmp
0000000000000010 start2

0000000000000010 in r0, 0
0000000000010111 xoi r0, 1
0000000000010011 ani r0, 1
0000000000000100 out r0, 0
0000000010110000 jmp
0000000000000001 start1
###########################################################
0000000000000000

0001111111110001
0000111111110001
0000000000001101
0110000010110000
0000000000001010
0000111111111001
0000000010110000
0000000000000100
0001000000001101
0110000010110000
0000000000010000
0001111111111001
0000000010110000
0000000000000011
0010000000001101
0110000010110000
0000000000010110
0010111111111001
0000000010110000
0000000000000010
0000000000000010
0000000000010111
0000000000010011
0000000000000100
0000000010110000
0000000000000001
